articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Multiple-Rocket Launching Drill of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Multiple-Rocket Launching Drill of KPA
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the multiple-rocket launching drill of women's sub-units under KPA Unit 851.
					 He received a report on the firing plan and gave an order to start the drill.
					
					 The women soldiers of the sub-units rapidly moved and deployed the launching systems in the firing positions, loaded rockets and aimed at the targets.
					
					 In a little while, rockets were fired into the sky, making endless columns of flames, and pounded the targeted zone in succession.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction, saying: "They are good at firing. All the targets have been hit. Artillery women are crack shots."
					
					 He highly appreciated the successful drill, saying that all the artillery women of the unit were fully prepared to hit the targets as they have undergone intensive training and they made a good start of the combat and political training for the new year.
					
					 He noted that the army exists to fight a battle, adding that he organizes and guides intensive drills of units in unexpected forms and methods, creating circumstances any moment with an aim to personally examine whether units are ready to fight a ferocious enemy right now and emerge victorious and thoroughly prepare them.
					
					 Underscoring the need for the People's Army to spend ordinary days with drills, being aware that a war may break out right now and that there is no tomorrow for rounding off the combat preparations, he stressed that what is most important for the commanding officers is to strictly orientate the military and political work to intensifying the drills.
					
					 Recalling that the People's Army conducted a lot of drills this year, he instructed it to fully prepare soldiers as a-match-for-a-hundred fighters by more frequently organizing higher-intensity drills of various forms such as those for judging the capability to fight real battles next year, too.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, O Kum Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Choe Yong Ho, Kim Yong Bok, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Pyong Chol and Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: WPK Congratulates Congolese Party of Labour
articles.content:
WPK Congratulates Congolese Party of Labour
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to the Central Committee of the Congolese Party of Labour on its 45th founding anniversary.
					 The message rejoiced over many successes achieved by the party in the work for national reconciliation and unity, socio-political stability and economic development of the country for the past 45 years since its foundation.
					
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would continue to develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished the Congolese Party of Labour greater success in its work for strengthening the party and achieving prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Cambodian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Cambodian PM
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting to Hun Sen, prime minister of Cambodia, on Dec. 20 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Cambodia.
					 The message said that since the establishment of the diplomatic relations the peoples of the two countries have steadily promoted the close ties of friendship and cooperation in all fields of politics, economy and culture in the common idea of sovereignty, independence and non-alignment.
					
					 It expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the prime minister greater success in his work for the prosperity of the country and well-being of its people.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong also sent a similar message to Hor Nam Hong, Cambodian deputy prime minister who is also minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015).
					 The floral basket was handed over to DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Diplomatic Corps Here
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Diplomatic Corps Here
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015).
					 They were handed to DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan who is doyen of the diplomatic corps, and Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez on Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Family of Zhang Wei-Hua
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Family of Zhang Wei-Hua
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Tuesday received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Wei-Hua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on the occasion of the third anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year, Juche 104 (2015).

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the missions of the WHO, the World Food Program, the United Nations Children's Fund and UN FAO here Tuesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015).
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Staff members of the UNDP mission also visited the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Widow of An Tong Su Sends Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Widow of An Tong Su Sends Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A floral basket sent by Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015) was laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Celebrated
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people across the country significantly celebrated the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean people's Army (KPA).
					 Performances were given by artistes of central art groups at theaters in Pyongyang.
					
					 The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theater put on the stage such numbers as male solo "Arms of Paektusan Will Answer", male quartet "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order", orchestra "Footstep".
					
					 The performers expressed boundless reverence for Kim Jong Un and truthfully represented the high pride and self-esteem of the army and the people of the DPRK who are blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 The artistes of the National Circus at the Pyongyang Circus Theater put on the stage such colorful numbers as physical acrobatics "Wisdom of the Nation" and comedy circus "Congratulations".
					
					 Art performances were also given in different parts of the country to stir up the festive atmosphere. 
					
					 Sports games including basketball, volleyball and table-tennis took place at institutions of different levels, factories, enterprises and farms in Pyongyang and local areas.

articles.title: Youth and Students' Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Youth and Students' Dancing Parties Held
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Tuesday, the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Dancing parties started to the tune of the song "Joy of the People" at plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Arch of Triumph and other places here.
					
					 Youth and students presented cheerful dances, extending the highest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un who has significantly bolstered up the country's political and military might and demonstrated the dignity of the great Paektusan nation and its spirit of achieving prosperity by providing his outstanding and seasoned leadership.
					
					 Boundless attraction and intense loyalty to the peerless great man could be read on the faces of the youth and students who were enthusiastically dancing to the tune of songs "Our Leader Loved by People" and "Your Care Is the Best".
					
					 Song "Revolutionary Armed Forces Upholds Leadership of Marshal Only" resounded far and wide, showing the iron faith and will of the five million members of the young vanguard to make a breakthrough for the drive to defend socialism and build a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On the same day similar dancing parties took place in every provincial capital, city and county.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Pomiculture
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Pomiculture
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK people have made big strides in the field of pomiculture this year, true to the noble intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to turn the country into a big orchard.
					 A project for updating the Kosan Fruit Farm proceeded rapidly, with creation of 260 hectares of orchard, including 140 hectares of dwarf apple trees, and installation of 354 000 concrete props. A modern wire net factory took its shape at the farm, while a big progress was made in the construction of large fruit storehouse and feed processing mill.
					
					 The construction of Pukchong Apple Institute drew to near completion and a pig farm with big capacity was built at the Toksong Apple Farm.
					
					 A signal progress was made in the work to supply various species of fruit saplings. Nearly 60 hectares of orchard appeared at the Jangyon Fruit Farm and 20 hectares of sharp persimmon, 450 hectares of peach and apricot and 32 hectares of new walnut strain were additionally created throughout the country.
					
					 Onchon, Sariwon and other fruit farms pushed ahead with the construction of reservoirs to protect orchards from damage by drought, flood and rainstorm.
					
					 Besides, remarkable achievements were made in the work to protect the fruit trees from harmful insects and raise the quality of products.
					
					 100-odd agrochemical production bases were built and a method of producing new kinds of efficient insecticides was introduced.

articles.title: Sony Pictures Entertainment Incident Is Misfortune Caused by U.S. Itself: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Sony Pictures Entertainment Incident Is Misfortune Caused by U.S. Itself: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S., far from drawing a due lesson from the Sony Pictures Entertainment incident, is trumpeting about investigation into its wirepuller and search for chief culprit, while linking it with the DPRK.
					 The president, the secretary of State and other U.S. high-ranking authorities vied with each other to claim that it was confirmed that the cyber attack on the Sony Pictures Entertainment was manipulated by the DPRK behind the scene, and cried out for taking "symmetric counteraction" and "re-designating the DPRK as a sponsor of terrorism".
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says this is nothing but signs of an impending downfall of those seized with the moves for slandering the DPRK.
					
					 We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the U.S. is focusing its offensive for stifling the DPRK on hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 As the U.S. openly revealed its criminal attempt to bring down the idea and social system of the DPRK while getting frantic in the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign, the DPRK solemnly declared at home and abroad that it would take the unheard-of toughest counteraction.
					
					 It is the disposition and mode of struggle of the DPRK that it does not make empty words and that it would do once it declared to do.
					
					 The U.S. and the riff-ruffs following it had better not bring misfortune by themselves.
					
					 The Sony Pictures Entertainment incident is a misfortune and disaster caused by the U.S. itself, not by others.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop at once its provocation moves against the DPRK and respond to its demand for a joint investigation for the present.

articles.title: Papers on Kim Jong Un's Songun Leadership Feats
articles.content:
Papers on Kim Jong Un's Songun Leadership Feats
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Papers here in editorials Tuesday say that the whole party, entire army and all people held Marshal Kim Jong Un as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army three years ago, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il, a historic event of decisive significance in carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu.
					 The past three years are shining as the proud course in which an epochal turn was made in accomplishing the Juche-based cause of building an army, Rodong Sinmun notes, and goes on:
					
					 All the hostile forces including the U.S. slapped unprecedented sanctions and ratcheted up pressure on the DPRK which suffered so suddenly the greatest loss of the father of the nation whom Koreans followed as Heaven and the leader of the revolution.
					
					 The party and revolutionary ranks get more firmly united in the stern test which would have collapsed others more than hundred times, and a fresh heyday was ushered in developing the revolutionary armed forces, powerful weapon for hewing out the independent destiny of the country and nation. This is the brilliant fruition of the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 His energetic Songun leadership serves as a decisive factor in consolidating the characteristics of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army as the army of the leader and party and putting its combat capabilities on the highest level.
					
					 His guidance over the overall socialist construction with the People's Army as a mainstay and icon opened a new era of prosperity of Songun Korea on this land.
					
					 The shining achievements made in the advance in the new century of Juche clearly prove the greatness of Kim Jong Un who is leading the Songun revolutionary cause to victory.
					
					 Minju Joson also says that the DPRK achieved a shining victory in confrontation with the U.S. to be specially recorded in national history and strikingly demonstrated its dignity and might as the great Paektusan nation as it held him as supreme commander.
					
					 The past three years' drive convinced the service personnel and people of the rosy future of powerful Korea advancing under his leadership, the paper notes.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Launches Sit-in Strike on Emergency Situation
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Launches Sit-in Strike on Emergency Situation
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea launched a sit-in strike on the emergency situation on Dec. 26 in protest against the dictatorial rule of the puppet authorities, according to Jaju Minbo, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 South Korean society is getting seriously ill due to the disbandment of the legitimate political party, ferry Sewol disaster and deterioration of the people's living under the present regime, the organization said, terming the Park Geun Hye regime an ultra-right dictatorial regime which revived the "yusin" era.
					
					 The organization launches a sit-in strike on the emergency situation to put under control the serious political situation where democracy is being violated, it noted.
					
					 It called upon all political parties, civic organizations and people from all walks of life to fight against the dictatorial tyranny of the ultra-right regime.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Council for Ferry Sewol Disaster in south Korea held a candlelight rally in Seoul on Dec. 27 to probe the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 256 days have passed since the disaster, the organization said.
					
					 But dead bodies are still left in cold waters of the sea, the truth about the disaster has not yet been probed and chief culprits involved in it have not been severely punished, it charged.
					
					 It stressed that it would probe the truth about the sinking accident to the end in order to make a safe society desired by the bereaved families and other people.

articles.title: Leaflets Critical of S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive Scattered in Seoul
articles.content:
Leaflets Critical of S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive Scattered in Seoul
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- At least 10 000 leaflets accusing the puppet chief executive of south Korea of her policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen were scattered in the area of Mapho District, Seoul on Dec. 26, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 Articles satirizing the chief executive were found in different parts of Myongdong, Seoul on Dec. 25, drawing attention.
					
					 Leaflets bearing the words critical of the present regime illustrated with a painting showing the ugly face of the chief executive were scattered in Kwanghwamun and atop a building in Mapho District, Seoul in October.

articles.title: Protests against Forcible Disbandment of Progressive Political Party Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protests against Forcible Disbandment of Progressive Political Party Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in south Korea staged actions in Seoul, Pusan, Kwangju and other parts of south Korea on Dec. 27 in protest against the puppet authorities' disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party (UPP), according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The Solidarity for Progress and other organizations held a rally at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station at which they said it would seek the retraction of the worst decision in history on the UPP.
					
					 It is a plot that the Park Geun Hye regime and the "constitutional court" cited the "violent revolution" and "building of socialism" as the reason why they disbanded the political party, it charged.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants marched as far as Chonggye plaza, holding slogan boards reading "death sentence to democracy" and "end to Park Geun Hye's dictatorship".
					
					 A rally took place in Pusan, too, under the sponsorship of the Pusan People's Solidarity to denounce the puppet group's moves for eliminating the progressive political party.
					
					 Organizations in Kwangju and South Jolla Province held a rally in Tonggu, Kwangju City and condemned the decision on disbanding the UPP as an act of violating democracy.
					
					 Rallies were also held in Jonju, North Jolla Province and Chunchon and Wonju, south Korean Kangwon Province.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Tuesday received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on the occasion of the third anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The letter said: 
					
					 Holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme commander of the KPA marked a great auspicious event of national significance for the Korean people and the service personnel and a historic event of epochal significance in the Juche-based cause of army building and the development of the Korean revolution.
					
					 As Kim Jong Un assumed the supreme commandership of the KPA, our country has won one victory after another in the unheard-of fierce all-out confrontation with U.S. imperialism and demonstrated its might as a political, ideological and military power, remaining unfazed by any storm and stress.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the supreme leader of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the great sun of the Korean nation whom all the service personnel and people are holding in high esteem with all hearts.
					
					 The letter reiterated the resolution to rally broad masses of Koreans in China around the general association under the banner of patriotism and build it into an overseas citizens' organization of Juche Korea strong in Juche character and national character and conducting a dynamic reunification patriotic movement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered at DPRK Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Memorial meetings, photo and book exhibitions, film shows and other events took place at DPRK missions in Vietnam, Iran, Cambodia, Myanmar, Switzerland, Poland, Spain, Germany, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Equatorial Guinea, Angola and Egypt, the DPRK permanent mission at the UN and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva on Dec. 16 and 17 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Also displayed there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					Films shown included Korean films "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "Arms of Korea".
					
					The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length portraits of them and paid tribute to them.
					
					The chairman of the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam said:
					
					The whole life of Kim Jong Il is the precious one for the country and its people.
					
					His demise is the great loss to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people.
					
					Personages of many countries of the world are visiting DPRK embassies to honor the memory of him.
					
					The prime minister of the Yangon regional government of Myanmar praised Kim Jong Il as the distinguished leader and benevolent father of the people who turned the DPRK into an invincible power.
					
					The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to defending and glorifying socialist Korea and took the road of devotion for the country and people till the last moments of his life.
					
					A director of the secretary room of the minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Equatorial Guinea said that the DPRK would always emerge victorious as it is led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Praise Songun Leadership of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Praise Songun Leadership of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Dec. 18 on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il assumed the supreme commandership of the KPA on the significant day when anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk was born.  Therefore, a firm guarantee for carrying forward the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu was provided, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Socialist Korea faced difficulties in the 1990s.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, suddenly passed away and it was followed by the consecutive years of natural disasters.
					
					 The Soviet Union and East European socialist countries collapsed and the U.S. and the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK became evermore undisguised.
					
					 Kim Jong Il resolutely foiled all kinds of challenges with his original Songun politics and turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state, a country that manufactures and launches satellites.
					
					 He opened up a bright prospect for achieving Korea's reunification by providing two historic north-south summits.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, a new leap forward was made in the Korean people's drive for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: British Organizations Praises Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats
articles.content:
British Organizations Praises Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Dec. 13 on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership was a historic event of great significance in developing the revolutionary armed forces and accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					 He developed the KPA into the army of the leader by dint of the steel-like unity based on the Juche idea, Songun idea.
					
					 His Songun revolutionary leadership brought about the great army-people unity.
					
					 He is the great Songun brilliant commander and general of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He honorably defended Juche Korea, socialist fortress, resolutely smashing the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle Korean-style socialism.
					
					 He pursued the Songun politics to put forward the KPA as the main force of the revolution and develop it into the army strong not only in the aspect of military strength but also in political and ideological aspects.
					
					 We are recollecting with deep emotion the undying Songun feats of Kim Jong Il, invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary cause of the DPRK is being successfully carried forward by KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The KPA led by him will always emerge victorious.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meeting, seminar, round-table talks, lecture and book and photo exhibition took place in Russia from December 10 to 17 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Displayed there were books and photos introducing the immortal flower Kimjongilia and true picture of the ever-victorious DPRK.
					
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that Kim Jong Il held high the banner of Songun in the whole period of his life and frustrated all sorts of challenges of the imperialists.
					
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" noted that Kim Jong Il was a great leader of the Korean people as he devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Blagobeshensk Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that Kim Jong Il opened the era of new surge for the socialist cause by leading the struggle for defending socialism to victory late in the last century.
					
					 The chairman of the Kirov Association for the Study of the Juche Idea introduced the brief biography of Kim Jong Il and referred to the exploits performed by him in all fields of the revolution and construction.
					
					 The chairperson of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia Women's Council "Hope of Russia" said that Kim Jong Il conducted energetic activities with his warm loving care for the country and its people all his life.
					
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial Social Organization "Association for Friendship with Korea" stressed that the world-startling miracles are being wrought in the DPRK under the guidance of Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Praised by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Praised by Bulgarian Organization
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a special bulletin on Dec. 22 to mark the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin in an article said:
					
					 The Korean people significantly celebrate Dec. 24 every year. It is not only the day when they held leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army but also the birthday of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk was born in Hoeryong, Korea in 1917.
					
					 She embarked upon the road of revolution in her early years and remained loyal to the great Comrade Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 She brought Kim Jong Il up to be the sun of the future.
					
					 She made great contributions to the building of a new country after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 She devoted her great efforts to the work of education, in particular.
					
					 She paid deep attention to successfully bringing up the sons and daughters of the comrades-in-arms who had laid down their lives in the struggle for liberating the country.
					
					 She energetically led the work for building Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 She also made a tangible contribution to building the regular armed forces.
					
					 She passed away to the sorrow of all while devoting herself to building a new country day and night.
					
					 The Korean people are highly praising her as anti-Japanese war hero and the great mother of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de artilleras de unidad 851 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de artilleras de unidad 851 del EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio los ejercicios de fuego de las subunidades de las artilleras de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados, adscritas a la unidad 851 del EPC.
					Tras escuchar el plan de entrenamiento, el dio la indicacion de comenzarlo.
					
					Trasladadas rapido a las trincheras de fuego, las artilleras cargaron los obuses y colocaron los blancos en sus colimadores.
					
					Unos momentos despues, se dispararon los proyectiles que atacaron sucesivamente las metas.
					
					El Comandante Supremo se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que las artilleras acertaron los blancos.
					
					Las artilleras de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados de la unidad 851 del EPC se prepararon todas para acertar cualquier blanco, dijo y continuo que esto es el resulto de los intensivos ejercicios.
					
					Ellas dieron el primer canonazo de los ejercicios politicos-militares del ano nuevo, apunto y evaluo altamente la marcha exitosa del entrenamiento de fuego.
					
					El ejercito existe para la batalla, dijo y agrego que el organiza y dirige intensamente los ejercicios de las unidades militares con las formas y metodos imprevisibles indicandoles las contingencias inesperadas en cualquier momento.
					
					Lo hago para preparar mejor a las unidades luego de chequear directamente si ellas pueden vencer frente a los enemigos atroces aunque estalle la batalla ahora mismo, asevero.
					
					El EPC tiene que intensificar los ejercicios en los dias de paz redoblando la determinacion de que la guerra puede estallar ahora mismo y no se debe dejar para manana los preparativos de combate, senalo e instruyo a los comandantes orientar de punta a cabo las labores politico-militares a la escalada de los ejercicios.
					
					Recordando que este ano, el EPC realizo muchos ejercicios, resalto la necesidad de organizar en el ano proximo con mas frecuencia e intensidad los entrenamientos de diversos tipos, incluso la evaluacion de capacidad ejecutiva de la batalla real, a fin de formar a los militares como combatientes capaces de pelear a solas contra cien enemigos.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Choe Ryong Hae, Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, O Kum Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Choe Yong Ho, Kim Yong Bok, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Pyong Chol y Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente palestino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente palestino
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que con motivo del Ano Nuevo 104 (2015) de la Era Juche, le enviara el Presidente del Estado de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas. 
					El embajador palestino en Corea, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, lo entrego el dia 30 al canciller coreano Ri Su Yong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores y carta de Cuerpo Diplomatico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores y carta de Cuerpo Diplomatico
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion que con motivo del Ano Nuevo 104 (2015) de la Era Juche, le dedicara el Cuerpo Diplomatico acreditado en Corea. 
					El embajador palestino Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, quien preside dicho cuerpo, y el embajador cubano German Hermin Ferras Alvarez los entregaron el dia 30 al canciller coreano Ri Su Yong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de familia de Zhang Weihua

Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de familia de Zhang Weihua
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le enviara el dia 30 la familia del martir revolucionario antijapones de China Zhang Weihua con motivo del 3o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ano Nuevo 104 (2015) de la Era Juche.

articles.title: CC del PTC envia mensaje de felicitacion al CC del Partido Congoleno del Trabajo
articles.content:
CC del PTC envia mensaje de felicitacion al CC del Partido Congoleno del Trabajo
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 30 un mensaje de felicitacion al CC del Partido Congoleno del Trabajo con motivo del 45o aniversario de la fundacion de esta organizacion politica.
					La misiva expresa alegria de que durante 45 anos despues de su fundacion, el PCT logro  muchos exitos en el trabajo para la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, la estabilidad sociopolitica y el desarrollo economico del pais.
					
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos sigan ampliandose y desarrollandose en el futuro tambien, desea mayores exitos en el trabajo del PCT para fortalecer el partido y lograr la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: EE.UU. se ha buscado incidente de Sony Pictures, opina Minju Joson
articles.content:
EE.UU. se ha buscado incidente de Sony Pictures, opina Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Ahora Estados Unidos vincula el incidente de Sony Pictures con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, lejos de sacar la leccion, insistiendo en "investigar al manipulador trasero" y "buscar al culpable principal". 
					El presidente, el secretario de Estado y otros altos funcionarios norteamericanos abogan por las "contramedidas equivalentes" diciendo que "se ha confirmado que la RPDC esta detras del ataque cibernetico contra Sony Pictures" e insisten en "incluirla de nuevo en la lista de paises que patrocinan el terrorismo". 
					
					En un comentario individual de este martes, el periodico Minju Joson apunta que aquellos estan enloquecidos por calumniar y conspirar contra la RPDC y continua:
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que la ofensiva anti-RPDC de EE.UU. se enfoca en insultar la maxima dignidad de ella. 
					
					Dado que el imperio expone abiertamente el intento criminal de eliminar la idea y el regimen de la RPDC recurriendo a la intrigante campana de "DDHH", la RPDC declaro con solemnidad al interior y exterior que entraria en la batalla de enfrentamiento intransigente nunca vista antes. 
					
					Cumplir sus palabras es el temperamento y modo de lucha de la RPDC. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, la RPDC deja en claro a EE.UU. y sus seguidores que el incidente de Sony Pictures es el desastre causado por el mismo imperio. 
					
					Antes de sufrir peores desastres, EE.UU. debe poner fin a los actos provocativos anti-RPDC y por inmediato, aceptar la demanda de esta de abrir una investigacion conjunta sobre ese incidente.
